name: Hoarding Hero
description:
Go on Quest, Fill your house with powerful Artifacts until it’s full to the brim! Hoarding Hero is a casual RPG game with rogue-like elements, where you can fill up your house with powerful items to gain their power to go on harder quest to find even more treasures.

Genre : Singleplayer Casual RPG 

As a player you will control a hero and assign him to a quest where each quest will have their own risk and rewards. Fight enemy in a simple turn-based battle and win to get various loots.

One of the loots are Artifacts, powerful items that can grant boons if stored in your house.

Key Features

  • Simple but strategic turn-based battle
  • Upgrade your house and store powerful artifacts for their bonuses
  • Procedurally generated quests, enemies and items giving new fresh challenges every time
  • Rewarded for every run, use hard earned coins for permanent upgrades

The game was made for Gamejam+ 2022 Entry in less than 48 Hrs.

Thank you for downloading and playing, we're very sorry for the bugs in-game (if any) we will try to fix and improve the prototype if possible in near future
